The Related Discourses

34. Rādha (cf. SN 23: Rādha Saṃyutta)

The Mindfulness of Breathing group consists of 22 full sutras and 111 abbreviated variants for a total of 133. The material is found in fascicle 6 of Taisho No. 99. Below is a list of the English translations currently available.

Note: Previous English translations currently available at SuttaCentral are referenced below. The reader should be aware that titles for SA sutras are supplied by the translator(s). The sutra numbering follows Yinshun’s reconstruction. The Taisho sutra numbers are noted for reference ("[T 99.xxx]").

  • 1. Discourse on the Conduit to Becoming (Anālayo) [T 99.111]
  • 2. Discourse on Penetrative Knowledge (Anālayo) [T 99.112]
  • 3. Discourse on Eradicating the Dukkha of Bodily Form (Anālayo) [T 99.113]
  • 4. Discourse on Understanding Dukkha (Anālayo) [T 99.114]
  • 5. Discourse on Worry and Sorrow (Anālayo) [T 99.115]
  • 6. Discourse on Viewing as a Self or as Belonging to a Self (Anālayo) [T 99.116]
  • 7. Discourse on Being with Influxes and Obstructions (Anālayo) [T 99.117]
  • 8. Discourse on Lust, Hatred, and Delusion (Anālayo) [T 99.118]
  • 9. Discourse on Desire, Craving, and Delight (Anālayo) [T 99.119]
  • 10. First Discourse on Māra (Anālayo) [T 99.120]
  • 11. Discourse on Being of a Mortal Nature (Anālayo) [T 99.121]
  • 12. Discourse on the Living Being (Anālayo) [T 99.122]
  • 13. Discourse on Craving, Delight, and Lust (Anālayo) [T 99.123]
  • 14. Second Discourse on Māra (Anālayo) [T 99.124]
  • 15. Discourse on What is Made by Māra (Anālayo) [T 99.125]
  • 17. Discourse on Being of a Mortal Nature (Anālayo) [T 99.126]
  • 18. First Discourse on Being of the Nature to be Abandoned (Anālayo) [T 99.127]
  • 32. Second Discourse on Being of the Nature to be Abandoned (Anālayo) [T 99.128]
  • 46. Third Discourse on Being of the Nature to be Abandoned (Anālayo) [T 99.129]
  • 52. Discourse on Seeking Out the Great Teacher (Anālayo) [T 99.130]
  • 112. Discourse on Becoming Habituated (Anālayo) [T 99.131]
  • 123. Discourse on Not Becoming Habituated (Anālayo) [T 99.132]
